Messages.WelcomeDescription:
Greetings! üëã
Thank you for adding me here!

My prefix is `{0}`, or you can just mention me - {1}. Also, you can use slash commands to interact with bot.
The list of commands can be viewed through `/help`.
You also can get support on our [Discord server](https://discord.gg/zfBffbBbCp).

Here is a brief overview of my commands:
Messages.WelcomeMusic:
You can request tracks from YouTube, SoundCloud, Yandex Music, Spotify and many other platforms.
You can control playback through buttons and commands. You can create and request your own playlists and much more. List of music commands - `/help music`
Messages.WelcomeLogging:
This bot collects a detailed history and can display all message changes in one place. If necessary, export the log to an image.
Changes to messages do not clog the log channel, instead the entire history is exported when the message is deleted.
To enable log collection, write `/enablelogging true`. To see the change history, put :book: under the desired message or use the command `/help history`
Messages.WelcomeLocalization: You can change the bot's response language with `/language`
Messages.WelcomeInfo:
`/help setchannel` - to assign a role to channels (without this, logging will not send reports when a message is deleted, for example)
`/help setprefix` - to change the bot prefix
`/stats` and `/userstats` - to view statistics
Invitation link can be found in bot profile
Messages.WelcomeGithub: If **you find an error**, you want to help with localizations or you **have an idea** - open an [issue](https://gitlab.com/skprochlab/nJMaLBot/-/issues) or create a [Merge Request](https://docs.gitlab.com/ee/user/project/merge_requests/creating_merge_requests.html) on [our GitLab](https://gitlab.com/skprochlab/nJMaLBot)!

Localization.Success: Successfully changed the bot language to `{0}`

MusicQueues.FF: **{0}** fast forward the `{1}` track for `{2}` seconds
MusicQueues.NodeChanged: **{0}** moves playback to a new node: `{1}`
MusicQueues.LimitExceed: **{0}** made `{1}` requests that were not fully processed. The queue already contains {2} tracks
MusicQueues.PlaylistLoadingLimit: **{0}** cannot load playlist with `{1}` tracks inside. Queue cannot contain more than {2} tracks

Music.NoListenersLeft: Playback stopped - no listeners or tracks left {loc:Common.HelpByVote}
Music.BotKicked: Playback stopped - the bot was disconnected from the channel by someone {loc:Common.HelpByVote}
Music.TrackIndexWrong: {0}, the playlist does not have a track with the index `{1}`. The valid value is from `1` to `{2}`
Music.PlaybackMoved: The playback bar has been moved to the music channel - <#{0}>
Music.OtherVoiceChannel: {0}, You must be in the same voice channel as the bot
Music.NotInVoiceChannel: {0}, You must be in a voice channel
Music.ChannelNotAllowed: {0}, you can‚Äôt play music in this channel. Use <#{1}> for this, or ask an administrator to change this through the server setup.
Music.MusicDisabled: The bot does not have access to any Lavalink server and cannot play anything. Write to the host owner about this problem.
Music.PlayerDropped: Unfortunately, the node that served your playback has crashed.
Music.PlayerMoved: The node that served your playback has crashed. We resumed it on another node.
Music.PlaylistSaved:
Playlist saved. ID: `{0}`
Use `/loadplaylist {0}`
Or `/addplaylist {0}`
Or `/runplaylist {0}`
Details about these commands can be viewed through `/help`
Music.CantConnect: The bot cannot join your voice channel `{0}`
Music.OnlyOneNode: Unfortunately, only the node you are using is available to the bot right now
Music.ResumeViaPlaylists: You can try to replay through `/loadplaylist {0}`
Music.WarningCustomEmoji: ‚ÄºÔ∏èCustom reactions for a beautiful display of the player are not available for the bot. To do this, it needs permission `USE_EXTERNAL_EMOJIS`.
Music.TrackNotSeekable: {0}, Unfortunately, this track is not seek-able
Music.TryReconnectAfterDispose: We are trying to revive the player automatically. If we didn't succeed, use `/loadplaylist {0}`
Music.ReconnectedAfterDispose: The player has been restarted. We fixed everything. If not, use `/stop` and `/loadplaylist {0}`
Music.ResolvingTracks: **{0}** made `{1}` requests. Processed `{2}` of them, added `{3}` tracks.
Music.CurrentTrackNonSpotify: The current track has not received from Spotify. Switch to a track from Spotify or provide the track ID as an argument to this command.
Music.TrackStuck: The current track is stuck. Let's skip.
Music.EffectParseFailedWithDefault: Error parsing effect arguments. Possible values: {0} or leave blank for {1}.
Music.EffectNotFound: No effect found with this name.
Music.MaxEffectsCountExceed: The maximum number of effects ({0}) has already been applied to the player.
Music.ClusterNotReadyCommandIgnored: Cluster not ready yet. Since this command does not add anything to the queue, it will be ignored.
Music.AwaitingNodeConnection: {emoji:LoadingAnimated} Awaiting for any music node becomes available. If it takes a long time, it might be worth contacting the bot owner
Music.NoSnapshotFoundToResume: Apparently the player has never stopped - there is nothing to restore. {loc:Music.RequestTracks}

Effects.AddEffectDescription:
1. Go to [configurator](https://tinyurl.com/enliveneffects) 
2. Enter effect name 
3. Edit other effect options 
4. Copy resulting json from "JSON Output" field at right upper corner 
5. Execute `/effects add YourJsonHere` command
Effects.NameLength: `Name` length must be between `{0}` and `{1}` characters
Effects.FiltersCount: You must set at least one filter
Effects.ParametersCount: {0}` filter: You must set at least one parameter
Effects.Between: `{0}` filter: `{1}` value must be between {2} and {3}
Effects.MoreThen: `{0}` filter: `{1}` value must be more then {2}
Effects.BandsDuplicate: The equalizer should not have duplicating bands ({0})
Effects.ApplyEffectDescription:
Use command `/effect NAME` where name is effect name or id.
Build-in effects: {0}
Effects.AddCustomEffectDescription: Use command `/effects add` to get instructions

Help.HelpPrefix:
Current bot prefix `{0}` or ping ({1}). Slash commands also available.
You also can get support on our [Discord server](https://discord.gg/zfBffbBbCp).
Help.HelpDescription: Help for all commands and categories
Help.NotFoundDescription: Command `{0}` not found. Use `/help` to see all available commands.
Help.userstats0_0s: The user whose statistics has been requested
Help.shuffle0s: Randomizes the tracks in the queue
Help.help0s: Shows information about a specific command
Help.renderlog0s: Displays the message change history as an image
Help.history0s:
Shows the message change history.
You can also put emotion üìñ under the desired message
Help.history0_0s: ID of the message whose history needs to be displayed. You can also use a pair of `channel ID`-`ID messages`
Help.setprefix0s: Assigns a prefix for bot commands
Help.language0s: Allows you to select the language of the bot's responses
Help.setchannelrole0s: Specifies the channel that the bot will use for a specific type of messages
Help.setchannelrole0_1s: Channel link or nothing to clear role
Help.play0s: Play music by name or URL
Help.play1s: Play music from an attached file
Help.jump0s: Moves the playhead to the specified number of tracks. Can move back.
Help.goto0s: Moves the playhead to a specific track on it's index
Help.clearhistories0s: Clearing all message change logs from this server
Help.runplaylist0s: Adds the contents of the playlist to the track list and goes to the track specified in the playlist
Help.addplaylist0s: Adds playlist content to track list
Help.loadplaylist0s: Replaces a track list with a playlist
Help.saveplaylist0s: Exports the current track list to a playlist
Help.fastforward0s: Fast forward for a specified time
Help.fastforward0_0s: Amount of time. The default is 10 seconds. For example: `4d3h2m1s`
Help.seek0s: Sets the playing track's position to the specified position
Help.remove0s: Deletes the specified track (or range of tracks) from the playlist
Help.remove0_0s: Track number (or the beginning of the range if the second parameter is specified)
Help.changenode0s: Attempts to move playback to another music node. May help if current node lags
Help.invite0s: Helps you invite a bot to another server
Help.logging0s: Shows a message logging control panel
Help.fixspotify0s: Wrong tracks when requesting from Spotify? We need to put an end to this. Together.
Help.fixspotify0_0s: Spotify URL of the desired track
Help.playnext0s: Same as `play`, but adds tracks immediately after the current one, not to the end of the queue
Help.playerrestart0s: Allows you to completely restart the player. Beware: Experimental feature
Help.effect0s: Applies or removes the post-processing effect
Help.effect0_1s: Parameter of the applied effect. For example `bassboost` mode: `Low`, `Medium`, `High`, `Extreme`
Help.effects_current0s: Display embed to allow manage sounds effects
Help.effects_add0_0s: JSON string representing new effect. Leave empty to get guide

CommandHandler.UnmetPrecondition: You do not have permission to execute this command!
CommandHandler.BadArgCount: Error - wrong number of arguments for this command. Here's a hint for using the command:
CommandHandler.ParseFailed: An error occurred while trying to parse this command. Here's a hint for using the command:
CommandHandler.CommandOnCooldown: The command you were trying to execute is on cooldown. Try again later.

Commands.RequestedBy: Requested by {0} | Help us by voting
Commands.SetChannelRoleResponse: Channel <#{0}> was successfully assigned the role {1}
Commands.CategoryChannelNotSupported: Despite the fact that discord allows you to specify a category in this command, it is necessary to specify the channel(not the channel category)
Commands.VoiceChannelNotSupported: Despite the fact that discord allows you to specify a voice channel in this command, it is necessary to specify the text channel
Commands.SetPrefixResponse:
Changed the bot prefix to `{0}`.
If you forget the prefix, just mention the bot.
Commands.CommandLoggingEnabled: Saving history for successful commands enabled
Commands.CommandLoggingDisabled: Saving history for successful commands disabled

MessageHistory.MessageNull:
Failed to get change history: message not found. 
Probable reasons: 
- Wrong ID 
- Message deleted 
- The bot no longer has access to it.
MessageHistory.MessageWithoutHistory:
[Message]({0}) change history not found.
Probable reasons:
- The message was written before the bot appeared on the server
- The bot was offline while writing the message
- The message was written in the log channel
- Logging is turned off (configure via `/logging`)
MessageHistory.ChannelDeleted: Channel {0} ({1}) on {2} was deleted. Cleared {3} messages.
MessageHistory.GuildLogCleared: The bot cleared the message history of the guild {0} ({1}). Cleared {2} posts.
MessageHistory.IdFailedToParse:
We cannot recognize the message ID (and channel ID) in `{0}`. 
Correct Input Example:
> /history 276780134676037642-728591222217637918
> /history 728591222217637918
MessageHistory.DeletedMessagesPackDescription: **Deleted messages whose change history cannot be found:**

Statistics.Title: Statistics

Statistics.NoUserStats: Apparently, {0} did not use the bot.

The bot serves `{0} servers`.
 These are `{1} text` and `{2} voice` channels.

Statistics.ByGlobalFormatted1:
This is the `{0} command usages` all time.
 This is the `{1} persons that used the bot`.
Statistics.ByMusicFormatted: The bot played `{0} days`, `{1} hours` and `{2} minutes` of music

Common.InviteDescription:
Open this bot profile and use "Add to server" button for inviting the bot to another server. Hope to see you there! üòÄ
Or you can find invite link on [out GitLab](https://gitlab.com/enlivenbot/enliven)
Common.VoteDescription:
You can **freely** support us on:
[top.gg](https://top.gg/bot/606760964183949314) (voting every 12 hours, write a review)
[discordbotlist.com](https://discordbotlist.com/bots/enliven) (vote every 12 hours)
[bots.ondiscord.xyz](https://bots.ondiscord.xyz/bots/606760964183949314) (write a review)
 Or you can just look at [discord.bots.gg](https://discord.bots.gg/bots/606760964183949314)

Do not forget about [our GitLab](https://gitlab.com/enlivenbot/enliven), where you can write errors and suggestions
Also, you can join our [Discord support server](https://discord.gg/zfBffbBbCp)
Common.OnlyRequester: Only the requester ({0}) can interact with this component

Thanks for using this bot. {loc:Common.HelpByVote}

{0}

To select an association, write it's number, for example:
> 1
Fast Association Vote:
> 1 +
Adding an association:
> new `Youtube query or url`
When adding a new association, your previous association (if any) will be deleted

Logging.LogChannelMissing: **not selected**. To select, send a message of the form ```/setchannel Log [here is the mention of the desired channel]```
Logging.Info:
üìù To add or remove a channel to the logging, just write a message that contains it's mention.
 For example:
> {0}
***Warning:*** Enable logging only for really important channels. Each message uses up storage for our bot. The more economically we all use it, the later I will have to introduce clearing history of old messages. Treat this with understanding
